name: GunDown (Gravityhamster)
description:
What is it?
-GunDown is a twin-stick shooter rogue-lite about collecting treasure and proving yourself a hero available free for Windows.

What's in it?
-Procedurally generated maps.
-5 unique worlds with their own sets of enemies.
-5 challenging bosses.
-A collection of creative weapons and items to choose from.
-A shop.
-2 playable characters with different strengths and weaknesses.
-Keyboard and Xbox controller support.
-Plus more!

I found a bug.
-Lovely. Please report it to me at thegundownemail@gmail.com!
